html: April 2 is #EqualPayDay, which is how long into this year it takes women catch up to what men were paid in the previous year. On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts. For women of color, the #wagegap is much larger.
text: April 2 is #EqualPayDay, which is how long into this year it takes women catch up to what men were paid in the previous year. On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts.  For women of color, the #wagegap is much larger.

html: Thank you @GovTimWalz for prioritizing the needs of Minnesotans during the shutdown. html: Hi everyone! I will be back in D.C. next week working to end this shutdown. As a result, I’ve rescheduled my first Town Hall to Saturday, Jan. 26th at 11:00am! I look forward to hearing from you!pic.twitter.com/38bkrMIenP
text:
Hi everyone! I will be back in D.C. next week working to end this shutdown. 

As a result, I’ve rescheduled my first Town Hall to Saturday, Jan. 26th at 11:00am! I look forward to hearing from you!pic.twitter.com/38bkrMIenP

html: I am thrilled to be named to serve on the House Committees on @HouseAgDems and @TransportDems! I will work tirelessly to make sure we listen to family farmers and partner with cities and towns to keep our communities thriving.

html: I’m an original cosponsor of the Paycheck Fairness Act because it’s long past time to strengthen working families by ensuring a woman receives the pay she deserves for doing the same job as the man working next to her.
text: I’m an original cosponsor of the Paycheck Fairness Act because it’s long past time to strengthen working families by ensuring a woman receives the pay she deserves for doing the same job as the man working next to her.

html: A productive conversation with Hastings Mayor Mary Fasbender about this fantastic community. Infrastructure, housing, and health care are all priorities. Can’t wait to work with you, Mary!pic.twitter.com/k9Hrh9mJf2

html: I just signed onto a bill that makes sure that Congress doesn’t get paid if the government is shut down. Until we get the government back up and running, it’s just wrong for us to be paid while federal workers struggle to pay their bills.pic.twitter.com/RPMJJIQa6u
text: I just signed onto a bill that makes sure that Congress doesn’t get paid if the government is shut down. Until we get the government back up and running, it’s just wrong for us to be paid while federal workers struggle to pay their bills.pic.twitter.com/RPMJJIQa6u

html: Today thousands of Minnesotans are missing their paychecks because of the shutdown. That’s unacceptable. We should not be playing political games with people’s lives. We need to #EndThisShutdown.
text: Today thousands of Minnesotans are missing their paychecks because of the shutdown. That’s unacceptable. We should not be playing political games with people’s lives. We need to #EndThisShutdown.

html: I just gave my first floor speech about the stories I heard from Minnesotans keeping our skies safe impacted by the shutdown.pic.twitter.com/ikP94JDGYp

html: Today I voted to reopen the government and make sure that no farmers are denied the relief they rely on, and no family or child in Minnesota goes hungry. We must end this shutdown now.
text: Today I voted to reopen the government and make sure that no farmers are denied the relief they rely on, and no family or child in Minnesota goes hungry. We must end this shutdown now.

html: I voted today to end the shutdown so families aren’t at the risk of being evicted. This shutdown has caused too much uncertainty for Minnesotans.
text: I voted today to end the shutdown so families aren’t at the risk of being evicted. This shutdown has caused too much uncertainty for Minnesotans.

html: I won't accept a paycheck during this or any shutdown where federal employees are not being paid and services are limited to Americans. I’ll be donating my salary to Eagan Open Door Pantry and Wabasha Food Shelf.
text: I won't accept a paycheck during this or any shutdown where federal employees are not being paid and services are limited to Americans. I’ll be donating my salary to Eagan Open Door Pantry and Wabasha Food Shelf.

html: We must end this shutdown now and provide certainty that hard-working families will receive their tax refunds on time, that farmers get the relief they are counting on and that federal workers again get paid for their work.
text: We must end this shutdown now and provide certainty that hard-working families will receive their tax refunds on time, that farmers get the relief they are counting on and that federal workers again get paid for their work.

html: I believe that Americans deserve an effective, efficient and modern government that reflects the many advancements we’ve made over the years. That’s why I voted to establish a special House committee to make sure this is a top priority for this Congress.
text: I believe that Americans deserve an effective, efficient and modern government that reflects the many advancements we’ve made over the years. That’s why I voted to establish a special House committee to make sure this is a top priority for this Congress.

html: In December I helped introduce the framework for the For The People Act, H.R. 1, and today I signed on as a cosponsor to fight to take the dark money out of politics, restore confidence in our government and make sure that your voices are heard.
text: In December I helped introduce the framework for the For The People Act, H.R. 1, and today I signed on as a cosponsor to fight to take the dark money out of politics, restore confidence in our government and make sure that your voices are heard.

html: My colleagues and I just voted to re-open the federal government, allowing tens of thousands of hard-working Minnesotans to go back to work and restore their pay. Now it's up to the Senate to do their job.

html: Today, I was sworn into the 116th Congress. It’s our job to work to ensure every Minnesotan has access to affordable, quality health care, to invest in the infrastructure of our communities and to prioritize career skills and technical education again.https://bit.ly/2SuGiN2
